original_title: Redefining the Line: The Making of One Hundred and One Dalmatians
overview: Making of documentary for Disney's animated feature 101 Dalmatians
tagline: The making of the classic animated film, and how its contemporary and modern feel in the 1960s made it stand out significantly in the Disney canon and its influence on animation.
title: Redefining the Line: The Making of One Hundred and One Dalmatians
